page.title: 08LONGFORGAN - COMMUNITY CNCL.
page.content: The purpose of the Community Council, established under the Local Government (Scotland) Act 1973, is to ascertain, co-ordinate and express to the Local Authorities for the area, and to Public Authorities,the views of the community which it represents, and to take such action in the interests of that community as are expedient and practicable. Longforgan with an electorate of 767 and a population of 1070 has 9 elected members. Eligibility for election or co-option is restricted to persons resident within the area whose names appear on the electoral register. The Council receives an annual grant from Dundee District Council to be used solely for administrative purposes. The Council meets monthly and these meetings are open to the resident public.
